scripts.build: npm run stop && npm run destroy && npm run start:clean
scripts.storybook: docker exec -it concourse_nextjs_1 npm run storybook
scripts.storybook:build: docker exec -it concourse_nextjs_1 npm run storybook:build
scripts.storybook:upgrade: docker exec -it concourse_nextjs_1 npx sb@latest upgrade
scripts.test:nextjs:coverage: docker exec -it concourse_nextjs_1 npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:nextjs:watch: docker exec -it concourse_nextjs_1 npm run test:watchAll
scripts.test:e2e:cypress:flaps: npm run test:e2e:cypress && docker-compose run cypress scripts/test-for-flaps.sh
scripts.destroy:global: docker system prune -f --volumes && docker image prune -a -f
